content: this is a pattern for a hand towel intended to hang on your oven handle or towel rack it should be made of 100% cotton yarn so it is functional and can be washed i recommend drying it flat and not in the dryer the pattern uses blue white and black 100% cotton yarn i used loops & threads classic cotton and it took about 1 5 skeins of blue less than half a skein of white and just a little black i would consider this an advanced beginner pattern it uses fpdc and bpdc to create a waffle like stitch please share pictures of your finished towels i d love to see them allons-y
